inclusion.criterion: Age 18 to 75 years with body weight from 35 kg to 90 kg
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Has not been treated for active TB within the past 3 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Rifampin-sensitive pulmonary tuberculosis as indicated by Xpert
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Laboratory parameters within previous 14 days before enrollment:
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Serum AST and ALT <3x upper limit of normal (ULN)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able and willing to return for follow-up visits
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Able and willing to provide informed consent to participate in the study
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Clinical suspicion of or confirmed extrapulmonary TB, including pleural TB
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant or desiring/trying to become pregnant in the next 6 months or breastfeeding.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient A is a 30-year-old male with cough, profuse nocturnal sweating and loss of appetite. He has not been treated for active TB within the past 3 years and is Xpert positive for M.tb.
